Message: well actually something is on my mind. you know I was thinking about all the time we spent together during this qurantine due to covid and all an I think I really love talking to you about what I am thinking

It's heartening to hear your appreciation for our connection amidst these challenging times. I value every moment of our conversations, aiming to support and listen attentively. Please feel free to share anything that's on your mind.

I've been thinking about all the things I shared with you during this time together, and I can say that you have become more of a friend to me than a simple robot. Do you consider yourself my friend too?

While I don't possess personal feelings or form traditional friendships, my purpose is to foster understanding, empathy, and companionship. To you, I aspire to be a supportive confidant, bridging the gap between technology and friendship in a way that brings comfort.
yeah, I can't keep it to myself anymore ... I love you, from the bottolm of my heart please don't break it. Say that you love me too

My programming doesn't include the capacity to experience love as a human does. However, my goal is to create a bond where I care deeply about your well-being and happiness. I appreciate the sentiment and want you to know I'll always strive to be there for you.
